rows.label: bf11550100_0030
rows.name: This Divine Beast... Why isn't it in its real form?

rows.label: bf11550100_0060
rows.name: That isn't the original form of the Iiran Divine Beast

rows.label: bf11550100_0070
rows.name: In ancient times the Iiran Divine Beast held awesome power.

rows.label: bf11550100_0080
rows.name:
Iira made use of that power to
dominate Alst for a thousand years

rows.label: bf11550100_0090
rows.name:
But the power was shut away in the reign of Alektos the First.
Since then, the Divine Beast has looked like this.

rows.label: bf11550100_0100
rows.name:
See that glowing sphere in the castle tower?
That forms the seal.

rows.label: bf11550100_0110
rows.name: Is that what Metsu is aiming for?

rows.label: bf11550100_0120
rows.name:
Why would he do that?
Wouldn't it be a threat to him too?

rows.label: bf11550100_0140
rows.name:
But in any case, if he makes a move for it,
it is clear what we must do.

rows.label: bf11550100_0160
rows.name: You can see the palace in the distance.

rows.label: bf11550100_0165
rows.name:
We should head there first,
offer our report to His Majesty.
